name: Ragnarok: Spear of Odin
description: A Hack & Slash version of the popular game Ragnarok Online. You start as an adventurer in the kingdom of Prontera we're you can be a Magician, Swordsman, or Thief. With the auto-play features you can finish quests and mission to get rewards, raid a dungeon by yourself or with your friends.Get daily and weekly rewards just for logging-in The adventures awaits in the palm of your hands. What are you waiting for?? Download Now!!
